channel.title: Dark Throne
channel.description:
http://www.darkthrone.com
Some people think it's a lot of fun or they think it's very boring. It's a web based game where you can attck people, pillage gold, make money, bank it, recruit citizens and do it all over again. It may not sound fun because I just summed up almost every part of it into one, but try it. It's not too bad of a game, and it's not addicting. :)
I also made 2 scripts for it to auto recruit and an auto banker. :) Enjoy!
~Ron

item.title: Dark Throne
item.dc:creator: @Alex_Owns Alex Owns
item.description:
@Alex_Owns wrote:

Dark Throne is the type of game where you play it once a day, for a year.

I have around 50000 turns on there, a HUGE army, etc.

Great once 3 years is gone =\

Read full topic

It’s an alright game i guess.

item.title: Dark Throne
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

It strikes me as the most tedious game of all time. And then I remember that some asshole made a board game called “Life”.

Read full topic
